author: Owen
subject: introduction
body: Hi my name is Owen Dewing and I go to Loyola Marymount University

author: Steve
subject: Fitness Journey
body: I started working out a month ago and have seen amazing results. My routine involves strength on Tuesdays and Thursdays and cardio on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday!

author: Jennifer
subject: movie recommendations
body: Some of the movies I've seen recently that I recommend are Dune 2, Saltburn, and Anyone But You!

author: Joe
subject: Travel Blog
body: Dream Travel Destinations: Switzerland, Scotland, Italy, Greece, South Korea, Thailand, South Africa
